text: yasa svargako visesata jasako parahejagaraharula'i vacana di'i'eko cha yo ho ki yasama panika naharaharu chan junaki pradusita humdainan. Ra yasta dudhaka naharaharu hunechan jasako svadama alikati pani antara pareko humdaina ra yasta peyapadarthaka naharaharu hunechan jasale pi'uneharula'i atyanta ananda pradana garnechan. Ra sud'dha madhuko naharaharu chan ra uniharuka nimti tyaham hareka prakaraka phala hunechan, ra unako palanakartabata ksama cha. (Ke yi sanyamiharu) uniharu saraha huna sakdachan jo sadhaim narkama rahanechan? Ra jasala'i umlirakheko pani khuva'ine cha jasale unako andraharula'i chiyaâ€“chiya paridinecha
